item.title: A new experiment
item.description: I’ve never really been a blogging fan I grew up in an era when blogging was like, so totally uncool, something only oldies and total lame-o’s did. There was definitely some truth in that in the early 2010s, but as a Gen Z baby, I missed out on web 1.0 by years and the vast majority of web 2.0. The only web I’ve ever known is a world of frameworks, Bootstrap, and mandatory responsiveness.
